video_prompt: A subtle upward drift of the figure, with the flowing gown gently swaying and rippling as if in a soft current. The golden wings exhibit a very slight shimmer and an almost imperceptible flutter. The hair also drifts softly, following the natural sway of the figure. Tiny, glittering particles gently rise and sparkle around the figure and within the starry background. The background stars twinkle and subtly intensify in brightness at random intervals. A very slow, almost unnoticeable zoom out from the image.
image_prompt:
A hyperrealistic and highly detailed full-body shot of a graceful, ethereal fairy soaring through a cosmic night sky. The fairy has long, flowing vibrant red hair and a serene expression, with her face gently tilted upwards and eyes closed. She wears a floor-length, shimmering silver gown that cascades around her, giving the impression of floating delicately. Adorning her chest is a small, golden butterfly embellishment. Her large, translucent golden-orange butterfly wings are outstretched, catching the ambient light and revealing intricate, glittering patterns.

The background is a deep, dark blue-purple cosmic nebula filled with countless bright, star-like lights, some appearing as radiant, glowing cross shapes, creating a magical and dreamlike atmosphere. The lighting is soft and otherworldly, emanating from the stars and reflecting off her dress and wings, highlighting textures and shimmering details. The composition is a dynamic full body shot, capturing the fairy in motion, with her arms gracefully extended outwards, adding to the sense of flight and freedom. There's a subtle sparkle effect on her dress and wings, enhancing the ethereal quality. The overall mood is one of celestial wonder and graceful elegance.
refined_video_prompt: The figure subtly drifts upward, her gown swaying and rippling like a soft current. Golden wings shimmer and almost imperceptibly flutter. Hair drifts softly, following the figure's sway. Tiny, glittering particles gently rise and sparkle around the figure and within the starry background. Background stars twinkle and subtly intensify at random intervals. A very slow, almost unnoticeable zoom out occurs.
creative_video_prompt_1: The golden wings explosively unfurl, propelling the fairy upwards with a shockwave of glitter. Her gown violently whips and flares, revealing a storm of shimmering particles. Her hair lashes wildly as the stars in the background rapidly streak past, intensifying into dazzling novas. The entire scene pulsates with raw, untamed celestial energy, threatening to rip apart at the seams.
creative_video_prompt_2: The shimmering gown transforms into liquid gold, flowing upwards to coalesce into a constellation of butterflies. Her hair unravels into glittering stardust, raining upwards into nebula-like spirals. The golden wings ripple, phasing into ethereal energy, pulling cosmic dust inwards as stars reverse and collapse into her form. Dimensionally, the background folds inwards, creating a cascading tunnel of light and impossible geometry as the entire scene warps into a single, pulsating singularity.
creative_video_prompt_3: A dramatic, slow-motion ascent of the celestial fairy, her shimmering golden wings expanding with an ethereal glow as she rises. The camera arcs majestically around her, revealing the vast, swirling cosmic backdrop. Her silver gown cascades downward, catching starlight, as glittering particles explode outwards, swirling in a theatrical display. Her auburn hair dances wildly, unbound by gravity, before settling into a soft, dramatic curtain around her. A final, powerful upward thrust, her arms outstretched, her face toward the starry abyss, as the camera pulls back into an infinite zoom.
